pages.title: Network connector
pages.text: Powerful computer peripheral, that will serve like a bridge between computers and your enderwire network. When attached to computer, this peripheral will populate events from configured network and allow to inspect network elements and even configure then!$(p)$(l)Note:$() By default, enderwire network has limited connection range between elements, take this to account

pages.description: Getter method for attached network name

returns: Returns attached network name or nil if element is not attached to any network

pages.description: Method for inspecting all networks element

returns: Array of network element representation or nil on error

pages.description: Method for inspecting exact element state

returns: Table with element state or nil on error

pages.description: Method for configuring enderwire element, changing it state (like turn off/on), etc.

parameters: element configuration, for each element type it is quite different, please, read the documentation

pages.description: Method for batch configuring enderwire element, changing it state (like turn off/on), etc. Should be used in case when you need to configure several items at once to avoid delay
